*Subject : assign - workflows - code* 

Hi from France :fr: ,
We would like to `assign a specific owner to a company` in some cases. Without having a *workflow* where we designate the person.
I am trying to avoid monster spider workflows.

Example: *Jason is the unique owner of company X. He will then be the owner of all associated objects.*
But, companies Y and Z are randomly assigned to a team member.

My first solution was to send the DB > a Gsheet > HighTouch sync to update the property.
OR using code in the workflow - call the owner in DB.


> *Have you ever seen this issue in the community or used code in a workflow for specific owners?* 
Thanks :sunny:
